# Results

inflation_US <- read.csv("Data/Inflation_US_2012_2021.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)

## Question 1. Sufrio mas

```{r}
plot(ts( (covid_MX$confirmed[-1]-covid_MX$confirmed[-nrow(covid_MX)])/128900000 ))
plot(ts( (covid_US$confirmed[-1]-covid_US$confirmed[-nrow(covid_US)])/329500000 ))

plot(ts( (covid_MX$confirmed[-1]-covid_MX$confirmed[-nrow(covid_MX)])/128900000 ),
     ts( (covid_US$confirmed[-1]-covid_US$confirmed[-nrow(covid_US)])/329500000 ))
```
